name: Dave
message:
Hi Tika, That’s really odd – I’ve just downloaded the project, added my maps key and the maps are being displayed. If they are not displaying for you then I suspect a configuration issue at your end.
Things to check are: do you have an internet connection, have you changed the keystore (you’ll know if you changed it) that you are building against, have you pasted the maps key in correctly?
Try regenerating a key as detailed in part 1 – is it the same as before?
Let me know how you get on – I’ll do what I can to help.
